Text.Page:
First thing first: clear the hallways. Can't do research with argons trying to argonify us every ten minutes.

Start with the tholzak emitters; they give commands like "harvest" and "exterminate" to the argon golems that patrol the halls.

Keep the broken emitters, though. Maybe the researchers in the Beastroar chamber can come up with a use for them.
That's a lot of emitters. And I bet the hallways are clear, too.
If you can bring us broken emitters, we may be able to take them apart and figure out what makes them work. Or not work, if you catch my meaning.
